title: 12/21/20 HOUR 1- Chris Simms
itunes:title: 12/21/20 HOUR 1- Chris Simms
description:
Chris Simms tells Dan that he would vote for Trevor Lawrence as Heisman. Chris says if he was Trevor; he would rather go to the Jaguars rather than the Jets.
